resources.string:
"The (Official) AIT Purity Test was inspired by the Rice Purity Test " "and serves as a segue from college life at US colleges to true study " "abroad life at the Acquincum Institute of Technology, Budapest. It’s " "a voluntary opportunity for the AIT student groups to bond, and for" "students to track the maturation of their experiences throughout their " "study abroad semester.

" "Caution: This is not a bucket list. Completion of all items on this test does not make you cooler.

"
resources.string-array:
Did you go to one country other than Hungary?
Did you visit at least two countries outside of Hungary?
Did you visit at least three countries outside of Hungary?
Did you visit at least four countries outside of Hungary?
Did you visit five or more countries outside of Hungary?
Skipped class to go traveling?
Took an overnight bus?
Went clubbing while traveling?
Had a friend visit you in Budapest?
Lost money for your spring break bookings?
Went to the welcome bar party?
Went to Instant?
Went to Szimpla?
Went to the UV party?
Went to the Karaoke night?
Played a drinking game with AIT people?
Had a slice of pizza from PizzaMe?
Went home with someone you met at a club?
Went home with someone from AIT after meeting up at a club?
Got denied getting into a club?
Played Avalon?
Knew someone too well from “Never have I ever” or Paranoia?
Picked up smoking while abroad?
Went to Vienna for smoking related businesses?
Got caught doing something illegal in Budapest?
Didn’t get caught doing something illegal in Budapest?
Kissed a random foreign person?
Kissed another student from AIT?
Kissed more than one student from AIT?
Kissed another student studying abroad in Budapest?
Went to AIT with your significant other?
Broke up with your significant other while abroad?
Said you were on a “break” so you could have fun abroad?
Found your significant other at AIT?
Lost your significant other at AIT?
Tried palinka?
Yelled at someone else to take a palinka shot with you?
Bought yourself a handle of palinka?
Tried tokaji?
Tried unicum?
Actually liked unicum?
Got wine drunk from the winery visit?
Went drinking on a weekday?
Drank for one week straight?
Drank for two weeks straight?
Went to AIT hungover?
Skipped class because you were hungover?
Napped in the student lounge?
Showered at AIT?
Slept at AIT?
FB messaged one of the AIT staff?
Is FB friends with an AIT staff or professor?
Is FB friends with more than one AIT staff or professor?
Bolted to AIT because you woke up late?
Used “sorry the bus came late” as an excuse for being late?
Played the AIT guitar/piano during break?
Tried to impress someone else by playing an instrument during break?
Went to Szenchenzy?
Went to the Turkish baths?
Watched the sunset at the citadel?
Went to Margaret Island?
Drank on Margaret Island?
Went thrift shopping?
Went to an escape room?
Visited the Parliament?
Joined some activity/team with Hungarians?
Spoken to a Hungarian in Hungarian?
Went grocery shopping at Auchan next to AIT?
Got a noise complaint in your apartment?
Complained that your apartment was the worst?
Took the M3 replacement bus?
Got lost taking the M3 replacement bus?
Got caught on public transport without a pass?
Tried to imitate the Hungarian announcements on the metro?
Tried turo rudi?
Had Langosh?
Had a gyro by the metro stops?
Started actually liking paprika on everything?
Cooked with someone from AIT not living with you?
Studied at Madal Cafe?
Spent too much money on coffee at Melbourne Cafe? (the cube cafe next to IBS)
Knows what tessek means?
Got the death stare from a Hungarian?
Gave the death stare back to a Hungarian?
Got yelled at in Hungarian, not understanding a word?
Had a successful conversation with a local in Hungarian?
Celebrated Busojaras?
Was lowkey harassed by busos at Busojaras?
Posted one abroad themed post on social media?
Posted two abroad themed posts on social media?
Posted three or more abroad themed posts on social media?
Had an entire social media account dedicated to abroad content?
Still receive advertisement in Hungarian on social media?
Turned your video camera on for your online classes?
Slid into someone’s Zoom direct message during class?
Accidentally sent the professor a zoom direct message?
Dropped a course since we went online?
Proclaimed love for Peter Ekler?
Used the phrase “Is it Understandable”?
Love AIT and wish you can go back soon!>
resources.string: Press start to begin the test
